Question: On June 22, 2006, U.S Vice President Dick Cheney referred to himself as the ____ of the Bush administration.
Hints: Introduced in Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope, this person is depicted as a ruthless cyborg pursuing the film's protagonists.
This person received the Ultimate Villain recognition at the 2011 Scream Awards.
Palpatine sends this person to kill everyone inside the Jedi Temple, and then to assassinate the Separatist leaders on Mustafar.
